Description: Replay Guitar Exchange presents this shredder's fantasy Epiphone 1958 Explorer Goth in a Pitch Black finish with black hardware. This guitar is modeled after the 1958 Explorer, with a mahogany body and neck and a smooth and accessable rosewood fingerboard. Alnico Classic humbuckers offer a killer heavy tone that is sure to steal the stage, while an LockTone Tune-o-Matic bridge provides perfect stability. For further 1958 Explorer asthetics and customization, a push/pull KillPot switch has been included in the design. This model is in Very Good condition, with minor scratches and blemishes in the finish, and an estimated 95% of fret life remaining. The power and style of the 1958 Explorer is within your reach, available now at Replay Guitar Exchange! As always, feel free to contact our store for more details, or with any questions. Weight: 8 lbs. 0 oz. Neck material: mahogany Scale length: 24.75" Nut width: 1.665" Fingerboard radius: 12" Neck shape: SlimTaper D Fingerboard material: rosewood Frets: 22, medium Country of origin: China Case not included Listing and template services provided by inkFrog
Title: Used Epiphone 1958 Explorer Goth, Pitch Black
